Yeonwoo Lee


Game Researcher
•
Game Curator

UX Designer

About

Delving deep into gaming worlds and exploring the rich culture that surrounds them. Passionate about crafting and decorating digital lives, aim to uncover the stories and experiences within and beyond the world of gaming.


Biography

Bachelor, Duksung Women University, South Korea
2018 — 2022

Majored in Philosophy (summa cum laude)

Master, Yonsei University, South Korea
2022 — 2024

Majored in Media Cultural Studies

Editor, Game Generation, South Korea
2023 —

Researcher, Netmarble, South Korea
May, 2024 — December, 2024
